data.eml:eml: A new species of Chilicola from Bahia, Brazil (Hymenoptera, Colletidae), with a key to the species of the megalostigma group

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Favizia Freitas de, Mahlmann, Thiago, Engel, Michael S. (2011): A new species of Chilicola from Bahia, Brazil (Hymenoptera, Colletidae), with a key to the species of the megalostigma group. ZooKeys 153: 81-90, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.153.2188, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.153.2188
